name: Virtual World
summary: Learn about .VRT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: VRT files appear more commonly with the .SVR extension, which is the compressed version of the VRT file.

description: A VRT file is a 3D file format that contains three-dimensional worlds that can be viewed in web browser with Viscape SVR plugin. It is used by the plugin to load and display the 3D world data to user for visualization and analysis. Information stored in a VRT file may comprise of data such as textures, sounds, dimensions, and behaviors. The most recent VRT files are stored in SVR file format which is a compressed version of the VRT file.

3D format for creating interactive three-dimensional worlds that can be viewed by web browsers with the Viscape SVR plugin; stores data, such as textures, sounds, dimensions, and behaviors, that make up the 3D world.
